description: A diagonal of triangle in A008826.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 148.
mathematica: a[1, _] = 1; a[n_, x_] := a[n, x] = Sum[StirlingS2[n, k]*a[k, x]*x, {k, 0, n-1}]; Table[CoefficientList[a[n, x], x][[-2]], {n, 3, 17}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 28 2013, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 27 2001
